thread.section_title: Americor Financial Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Americor Financial Services | americorfs.com
thread.title: Sharon Randolph
thread.title_full: Americor Financial Services reviewed by Sharon Randolph

author: Sharon Randolph
title: Sharon Randolph
text: I was in over my head with debt I ran up after the death of my husband. I looked into the different options available. I finally gave a call to Americor Financial Services. From the first phone call, the people at the company have been so helpful. Whenever I call, I get answers to my questions. I have only been working with the company for 9 months and they have already worked out settlements on 7 of the companies I owed money to. I am very happy with their efforts. I would highly recommend Americor Financial Services to anyone who is drowning in debt and needs help with to get out of it. It is a great solution!
